Message:
I—everyone admired the founder
not because of her moment of death.

It was her way of life—
resisting death and fighting
till her very last breath.

When someone dies,
they live on in someone’s heart...

That’s what I was aiming for—
that way of life!

When all my hard work had
gone to waste and killed
my future, I gave in...
To this disease, and to myself.

If I let this be,
outshining the founder
will be nothing more
than an empty dream.

Not to die in a blaze of glory,
but to captivate everyone
with my way of life.

These twin blades and I will
fight till I breathe my last.

Fighting for the fate of the world
will be perfect for leaving
behind proof that I died.

I’ll leave this world
earlier than them...
That’s inescapable...

Till the moment my life
comes to an end...!
